name: OpnForm
short_description: Open source form builder with advanced customization and workflow options.
description: Open source form builder with advanced customization and workflow options. OpnForm is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, forms, utility, automation. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host OpnForm on your home server to open source form builder with advanced customization and workflow options without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use OpnForm to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
